Reviews.Title: Really Nice Camera..Great Price.
Reviews.Author: K. R. Soto
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research on camera's in the price range and this camera offered more features than the others. I really love the camera. It is easy to use and takes nice pictures. I love the video feature and that it has a built in speaker. You must get a memory card because internal memory will only store one photo. There is no shutter delay. It also has different modes to take pictures in. The 5x optical zoom is super clear at any zoom level.Huge lcd screen display and the camera is ultra light. Not that it really matters but I also like the rubber buttons.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: mrsdbrock
Reviews.Content: This is one of the cheapest camera's I've ever gotten and its one of the BEST seriously. No complants here I love the cover case it comes with as well. Samsung is a great brand! I highley recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: Donna McKenzie
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the Samsung camera.  It is faster and has more features than another brand's camera I recently purchased as a gift.  Looks like Samsung is going to be a great name in cameras just like it is with televisions!

Reviews.Title: very good camera
Reviews.Author: skeeter
Reviews.Content: This is a top of the line unit.Slim, gorgeous finish, excellent images still and movies.We gave this for a gift to family member, see them using it all the time.

Reviews.Title: GREAT VALUE!
Reviews.Author: anibal1285
Reviews.Content: I am more than happy with these purchase, the camera is absolutely lovely, a certainly great value for the price.  I was looking with enough features to let me take good pictures, as well as be friendly use for my kids and wife. The quality of the pictures is lovely, the shipping was very fast and the camera even have and extra bonus, a cover for the camera.  I strongly recommend every body to choose the Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Not the most tech inclined person.
Reviews.Author: Nbarrett357
Reviews.Content: My mom is not the most tech inclined person and she was able to use the camera. Not going to lie I had to show her a few things but she caught on. The camera also was compatible with the printer that she got for Christmas and she was able to print out pictures of her new grand son that day.

Reviews.Title: Decent, not great
Reviews.Author: J. R. O. Neal "Islidur"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace an old 5mp Minolta and have to say the Minolta had better picture quality. I've adjusted all settings many times in all lighting situations, but the images always seem hazy or slightly out of focus. However, the video capture is nice quality. Overall not bad for a cheap point and shoot to capture quick images. I'll stick with my DSLR for the quality pics.

Reviews.Title: WOW!  IT'S EXCELLENT!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: jooyeon seo
Reviews.Content: I love the Samsung company. I never was disappointed by any Samsung product. I had a problem with a Sony camera which is use AA batteries. However, Samsung camera is rechargeble camera. When I recharge the camera it shows a small light turning red to green. I am REALLY happy with the choice I made to buy the Samsung camera. Since this product is so good,I will buy Samsung camcorder too to go with my Samusung camera.

Reviews.Title: Yes and no.
Reviews.Author: A. O. "SPK"
Reviews.Content: I had two of these. One accidently got wet when my purse fell into a sink and died instantly. The other just stopped working. No warning of any sort. I didn't have it for more than 2 months.

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto.
Reviews.Author: Rafael Barazarte
Reviews.Content: Estamos contentos con esta camara, las fotos son muy buenas y los videos mejor todavia. gracias nuevamente.la recomendamos a cualquier comprador.

Reviews.Title: convenient
Reviews.Author: Colleen Rodgers
Reviews.Content: does what it promises -snapshots and memories - not great quality for scenery detail but then not expected to be

Reviews.Title: There are better out there
Reviews.Author: J. M. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera fairly cheap at a going out of business sale from some online store. I was taking a trip, and my older Kodak digital is a bit bulky. This camera is great for portability, battery life, ease of connection and charging via USB, and it has a nice, large LCD screen. That's about where it stops being great.Unless the lighting is perfect, the pics tend to come out dark. And any slight motion occurring while the picture is being taken results in blurring of those objects (the movement could be subtle and it still shows up). There also appears to be a lot of 'noise' in the pictures, mostly visible in the darker-to-black range. Finally, I find the zoom function to be sloppy. When you press the button to zoom in, it takes a split second to go. It also takes a split second to stop when you release the button. And it is difficult to zoom in at variable speeds. It operates on extremes.When I saw this was 12.2 mp, I was excited. I have since learned that a good camera is not just about the megapixels. For example, my 2005 Kodak 5mp camera takes incredibly crisp and clear pictures. It has a lens on it that is considered higher end (at least compared to this Samsung). I mostly use the Samsung as a quick picture taker when I place items for sale on eBay. Perhaps I should place this camera there as well.I should mention that I only use the default settings as a point-and-shoot camera. I haven't delved into the settings on this thing.

Reviews.Title: It's ok, but a little disappointing..
Reviews.Author: Amberrr
Reviews.Content: I like this camera except for 3 things. When you take pictures, if it isn't in direct sunlight, or in REALLY  bright lighting, the pics turn out really dark..so I have to end up turning the night mode on and the pics still look odd. Secondly, a lot of the pictures turn out blurry so you have to keep retaking the shot till you get a decent one. Lastly, the button sucks. You have to press it a few times to get the shot, and usually by then, the "kodak moment" is gone. But for the pictures that actually do turn out, they look good. I like the editing options (the b&w; is really intese, love it!) It's ok, but definitely not worth $80..works like a $40 camera IMO. I'm sticking with Kodak from now on, they never disappoint.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING PHOTOS AN VIDEOS!
Reviews.Author: khaque6
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before buying this camera. I searched and compared nearly every brand and I have to say I that I extremely satisfied by this purchase! The Samsing SL605 is light and durable (I took take it everywhere with me!) and that was something that a traveler like me really needed. The added features really makes this camera a cut above the rest, even considering my last camera (which broke nearly in half the second I dropped it on carpet) was a Nikon Coolpix. The 12.2 megapixels is a terrific deal considering the price. Every picture I took during a concert I went to last night came out in the same quality as a camera priced 5 times more. It takes nearly the same quality pictures as my friend's $900 camera! You're able to capture action in dim lighting and take brilliant videos while still retaining the best picture quality. The only complaint I have is that it takes a while to learn how to properly adjust the features to exactly the right setting, and believe it is totally worth it.  And it's really quite a lovely red color. This is a deal you should not miss out on!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera Great Price
Reviews.Author: D. C. Morphis
Reviews.Content: My wife loves this camera.  It's not the smallest, cutest design we've ever seen, but it does take some incredible pictures.  The scratch protector is a bit cheap, and I hope the lens will take the inevitable beating the little ones in the house are likely to give it over time, but all in all we are quite please.  I looked for many weeks to find a good camera for the best price and I think I succeeded with this one.  Can't beat a 12.2 MP camera this loaded for only $79 or whatever it ended up to be . . .

Reviews.Title: NOT TOO BAD, NOT TOO GOOD!
Reviews.Author: ivana
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera in December. I was very excited to try it. But,when it arrived,I was kind of disapointed. The flash has a very hard shadow, and if you want to eliminate it, the pictures come out very blury!In the other hand, it has a lot of functions,the battery recharge very quickly,and if you are not shooting in a dark place, pictures may come out good.So,if you want a compact camera for fun, this is ok,but defenitely if you want very good results,go for a real camera!

Reviews.Title: White line in middle of screen
Reviews.Author: Amilcar
Reviews.Content: A annoying white line appeared after second used. Image quality is good, but screen is very fragile. Everything else is just nice.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Donna L. Lopinto "Donna shops"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. However, there was no memory chip with it.  All other cameras I have bought included a memory chip.
